ai.question: Which OSI layer is associated with IP addressing?
Which type of addressing is found at the OSI Layer 2? (Choose two.)
When a server responds to a web request, what occurs next in the encapsulation process after the web page data is formatted and separated into TCP segments?

choice.text: The client decapsulates the segment and opens the web page.
The client adds the appropriate physical addresses to the segments so the server can forward the data.
The server converts the data to bits for transport across the medium.
The server adds the source and destination IP address to each segment header to deliver the packets to the destination.
The server adds the source and destination physical addresses to the packet header.

ai.question: Which term describes a specific set of rules that determines the formatting of messages and the process of encapsulation used to forward data?
Which two are protocols associated with Layer 4 of the OSI model? (Choose two.)

framesIP addressMAC addresslogical addressingpacketsphysical addressingport numberssegmentsbitssequence numbers TransportNetworkData link Drag the networking terms on the left and drop them into their appropriate layer on the right. (Not all options are used.)123456789Key OSI layer conceptsRequires students to recognize the relationships between OSI layers and key PDU's plus addressing10782453161Transport will contain: segments, sequence numbers, port numbers. Network will contain: packets, IP address, logical addressing. Data link will contain: frames, MAC address, physical addressing.
